other_title: 新人ツアーコンダクター (Japanese)
新人ツアーコンダクター里奈 (Japanese)
plot: Rina was working for a travel agency, when they made her the head of the man's group. Rina then got shown around Matsusawa Village, since she heard that legends where there. After awhile of the loneliness the girls went to new heights and had sexual desires of the man in the group.
